sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
If \(i : j = 4 : 7 \), then find \((3 i + 7 j ):(7 i + 5 j )\)
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " $$\text{
 It is given that $
 i : j = 4 : 7 $.We need to find the value of }$$
\[
 \frac{\input[s1v1]{} i + 7 j }{7 i + \input[s1v2]{} j }
\]

 "}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{ \frac{3 i }{j } + \input[s2v1]{} }{\frac{\input[s2v2]{} i }{j } + 5 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{ 3 \left (\frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{7 } \right ) + 7 }{\input[s3v2]{} \left(\frac{4 }{7 } \right) + 5 }}
\]
 "}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{\frac{\input[s4v1]{} + 49 }{7 }}{\frac{\input[s4v2]{} + 35 }{7 }}
\]
\[
 = \frac{12 + 49 }{28 + 35 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{\input[s5v1]{} }{63 }
\]

 "}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
 $$\text{
 So, the answer is $61 : 63 $.}$$
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [3, 5], "text": " $$ \text{Please refer back to the question.} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [7, 7], "text": " $$ \text{Dividing numerator and denominator by j, we get the expression} \frac{{ \frac{3 i }{j } + 7 }{\frac{7 i }{j } + 5 }} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [4, 7], "text": " $$\text{Substitute the given ratio of i:j = 4:7, to get the expression $\frac{ 3 \left (\frac{4 }{7 } \right ) + 7 }{7 \left(\frac{4 }{7 } ight) + 5 } }$$ 
 "}, {"data": [12, 28], "text": " 
 $$ \text{We take LCM's to get the expression $\frac{\frac{12 + 49 }{7 }}{\frac{28 + 35 }{7 }}$
, after which multiplying both numerator and denomiator by 4 \text{, we get} \frac{12 + 49 }{28 + 35 }} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [61], "text": " 
 $$ \text{ Upon further simplification we get the following answer \frac{61 }{63 }.} $$"}, {"data": [], "text": "
 "}]
